visual_enhancers.radius: rounded-sm (2px) or rounded-md (4px) - Avoid large rounded corners

images.description: Minimalist white architectural abstract - Use for login background or subtle texture

motion.loading: Pulse effect on skeletons, Spinner for actions

accessibility.contrast: Ensure 4.5:1 for normal text. Use Slate-900 for main text.
accessibility.aria: Labels for all inputs, roles for custom widgets

universal_guidelines: DO NOT use gradients for backgrounds. Stick to solid colors or subtle textures.
DO NOT center align the main app container. Use left alignment for data density.
Use 2-3x more spacing than typical designs. 'p-8' is the new 'p-4'.
Every interactive element MUST have a 'data-testid' attribute (kebab-case).
Use Shadcn UI components but customize them to match the 'Swiss Logistics' aesthetic (remove rounded-xl, use rounded-sm).
For the 'Department' field, use a Shadcn Select component with the 19 departments of Uruguay.
For 'Ticket', use a read-only input or auto-generated display in JetBrains Mono.
Date/Time must be auto-captured on save, but displayed in the 'Recent Records' table.
instructions_to_main_agent: You are building a high-precision logistics form. The user wants 'Simple and Professional'. Interpret this as 'Swiss International Style'. Use the defined Red (#C91A25) sparingly for primary actions and alerts. The rest should be monochrome. The form should feel like a physical manifest. Use the 'Recent Records' section to show the last 5-10 entries in a dense, easy-to-scan table. Ensure the Excel export functionality is prominent but not distracting.
